meta.title: Approved COVID-19 Continuity of Learning Plan - Canton Preparatory High School

meta.content: Approved COVID-19 Continuity of Learning Plan - Canton Preparatory High School
Our authorizer, Grand Valley State University, approved our COVID-19 Emergency Continuity of Learning Plan (CLP) on April 10, 2020. Click here to view the plan.

div.main:
Approved COVID-19 Continuity of Learning Plan
Posted on April 10, 2020April 10, 2020 by Sean McAnally
Our authorizer, Grand Valley State University, approved our COVID-19 Emergency Continuity of Learning Plan (CLP) on April 10, 2020. Click here to view the plan.
Bookmark the permalink.
